reasons: While the information shared by Sergey Petrov raises valid concerns regarding the accuracy of reported outcomes, the credibility of the claims made is not high enough to warrant spreading it as second-hand information. It focuses on potential discrepancies that could be investigated, rather than established truths. Spreading it could lead to unnecessary conflict without verification.

Although the information has been classified as credible, it pertains to Sergey Petrov's role and the transparency concerns related to his actions. Spreading this gossip could further harm his reputation and strain partnerships. It is better to allow Sergey to confront the issue directly and reassure his partners.
